ygData.subject: Re: Band of rodcet life
ygData.msgSnippet: heheh maybe. But u will use alot of mana when u solo and the high ac makes me hard to hit also. the mithril greave would be a great item for trade. but the
ygData.messageBody:
heheh maybe. But u will use alot of mana when u solo and the high ac
makes me hard to hit also. the mithril greave would be a great item for
trade. but the stats really yuck and I'm after the sword more anyway or the
mithril arms.
----- Original Message -----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 14:14
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Band of rodcet life


> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> The Torque sucks! It should have include wis and int casters!!!
>
> Enough ranting, Holyomen got the better deal IMO, the torque only gives
you a
> little AC boast and and you don't use mana much anyway.
>
> Fesse Estasis, Cleric of the 42nd KOS circle.
>
